ICISMPDeviceBase class of an Ingenico Cradle device's communiation channel
ICAdministrationThe Companion's administration channel management class
ICBarCodeReaderBarcode Reader management class, derives from ICISMPDevice
ICISMPDeviceExtensionThis class extends ICISMPDevice by adding interface methods to send and receive data.

This class has not to be used directly by applications since it does not open a Companion session itself. It provides an API for sending and receiving data to the classes that implement a raw communication channel,like ICTransaction and ICSPP. These two classes inherit from ICISMPDeviceExtension and can therefore call its methods to send/receive data.

ICSPPTransparent SPP Channel Class

This class provides a transparent SPP (Bluetooth Serial Port Profile) channel for iOS application that require to communicate with a Bluetooth device paired with the Companion.
This class inherits from ICISMPDeviceExtension that provides all the required methods to send data or text synchronously or asynchronously. Those include:
ICTransactionTransaction Channel class
ICNetworkCompanion Network Management
ICPPPPPP Channel Class

This class implements a TCP/IP stack that allows an iOS device to communicate with an Companion terminal using TCP/IP over PPP on a serial link.
To initialize the ICPPP object, do as following:
ICPrinterPrinter emulation
ICSoftwareComponentThe terminal's software components
ICTcpServerTCP Server Class

Use this class to create a basic TCP server.
ICTmsInformationThe TMS's parameters
<NSStreamDelegate>
ICISMPDeviceBase class of an Ingenico Cradle device's communiation channel
ICNetworkCompanion Network Management
ICTcpServerTCP Server Class

Use this class to create a basic TCP server.
